About Subway Subway is a Fast Food restaurant located at 9558 Queens Blvd in Rego Park, NY 11374. Subway has been described as an Good Fast Food restaurant and has received an average rating of 5 by our members. Quick Facts
Cuisine: Fast Food Accepts Credit Card: Yes Parking: N/A
Atmosphere: N/A Take Reservations: Yes Serves Alcohol: N/A Smoking Allowed: No
